sentences.english: Zhou was diagnosed with leukaemia and cannot attend class.

sentences.english: Zhao Kuangyin, accepting the demised throne of the Latter Zhough, founded the Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 赵匡胤接受了后周“禅让”的帝位，建立宋朝。
